import { useState, useContext } from "react" import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faArrowRight, faArrowLeft } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import {DataContext} from "../../context.js" export default function Page(){ let {page, setPage} = useContext(DataContext) const addPage = ()=> setPage(prev=>prev<51 ? prev+1 : prev) const decreasePage = ()=>setPage(prev=>prev>=1 ? prev-1 : prev) return(
) }
